document.full_text: five elderly peace activists, two of them jesuit priests, were sentenced on monday to prison terms of two to 15 months for breaking into the navy's trident nuclear submarine base in washington state.
document.title: peace activists get jail time for navy base breach
lines_and_colors: five elderly peace activists, two of them jesuit priests, were sentenced on monday to prison terms of two to 15 months for breaking into the navy's trident nuclear submarine base in washington state.
